title: NOAA Research's top accomplishments from 2022
content:
Visual highlights of NOAA’s work in 2022. Credit: NOAA
Visual highlights of NOAA’s work in 2022. Credit: NOAA
Major hurricanes, intense wildfires, increasing concentrations of greenhouse gasses, deep sea discoveries, and more made 2022 an eventful year for NOAA Research. As we enter the final days of the year, we’re taking a look back at some of our biggest research stories from the last 12 months.
Preparing the nation for the impacts of climate change. People across the country are feeling the impacts of climate change through severe droughts, wildfires, catastrophic flooding, major hurricanes, heat waves and more. Working closely with our partners, NOAA is building a climate-ready nation through science, service, and stewardship.
